tool.name: Pairtools parse
tool.description: Find ligation pairs in .sam data, make .pairs.

param.name: SAM_PATH
param.label: Input SAM/BAM file
param.help: Input .sam or .bam file with paired-end sequence alignments of Hi-C molecules.

param.name: chroms_path
param.label: Input a chromosome order file
param.help: Chromosome order used to flip interchromosomal mates. Any scaffolds not listed will be ordered lexicographically.

param.name: minimal_mapq
param.label: Minimal MAPQ
param.help: Minimal MAPQ score to consider a read as uniquely mapped.

param.name: walks_policy
param.label: Walks Policy
param.help: The policy for reporting unrescuable walks.

param.name: max_int_algn_gap
param.label: Max alignment gap
param.help: read segments that are not covered by any alignment and longer than the specified value are treated as null alignments.

tool.help:
**Pairtools parse**
Detects ligation events in the aligned sequences of DNA molecules formed in Hi-C experiments and reports them in the .pairs/.pairsam format.
